analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/27/0x1e6241877af17d610bf967bfd4a6be21e18f4ed3.sol:
	Contract UTMCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/27/0x1e6241877af17d610bf967bfd4a6be21e18f4ed3.sol#219)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/27/0x1e6241877af17d610bf967bfd4a6be21e18f4ed3.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
